activities: Watchitoo provides global video collaboration services, in particular to the EU.  We do receive personal information which we use to contact our customers to provide technical and product updates.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
industrysector: Health Care Services - (HCS)Telecommunications Services - (TES)Films Videos & Other Recordings - (FLM)Information Services - (INF)
personaldata: Personal Contact Data, Clinical Data, Personal Health Information (PHI)
recoursemech: Watchitoo maintains an email address where all appropriate parties may contact us with inquiries or complaints regarding our privacy policies and processes.  All inquiries or complaints are forwarded to an internal ivestigative committee for review and address.  Unresolved privacy complaints concerning Watchitoo's Safe Harbor commitments will be referred to the American Arbitration Association as an independent dispute resolution mechanism.
